en_US.name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Jacket
en_US.description: Cozy fleece jacket made from recycled polyester with durable water repellent finish. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

de_DE.name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece-Jacke
de_DE.description: Gemütliche Fleece-Jacke aus recyceltem Polyester mit langlebiger wasserabweisender Beschichtung. Perfekt für Outdoor-Abenteuer.
